title: 8 Ways to Impress Your Boyfriend and Show Him Your Love in a Long Distance Relationship

steps.title: Tell him to dress up and cook a fancy dinner.
steps.content: Tell him to dress up and cook a fancy dinner. Set your computer or phone up on the table and enjoy a fancy meal “together” while you’re wearing your Sunday best. [1] X Expert Source Moshe Ratson, MFT, PCC Marriage & Family Therapist Expert Interview. 7 August 2019. Light a few candles to really set the mood, and don’t forget to pour yourself a glass of wine! [2] X Research source If you aren’t the savviest cook in the kitchen, try getting some takeout to enjoy instead.

steps.title: Surprise him with a fun care package he wasn’t expecting.
steps.content: Surprise him with a fun care package he wasn’t expecting. Fill a box with candy, board games, love notes, and anything that might remind him of you. Don’t tell him it’s coming so he’ll get the ultimate surprise when he checks his mailbox. If shipping a package is too much, just send him a letter instead. It costs less, and your words will be super meaningful.

steps.title: You can play games and make travel plans together.
steps.content: You can play games and make travel plans together. [3] X Expert Source Moshe Ratson, MFT, PCC Marriage & Family Therapist Expert Interview. 7 August 2019. Try downloading something like The Couples App or Happy Couple to connect with each other with fun activities and love notes. You can each log in every day to complete a task and stay connected to each other. Other couple apps include Rabb.it, Lovedays, and LokLok.

steps.title: Pick out a book to read and try to do a chapter a week.
steps.content: Pick out a book to read and try to do a chapter a week. When you talk to each other on the phone or via video chat, discuss the book and what you think about it. It will help you feel more connected to each other and also give you something fun to talk about on virtual date nights. [4] X Research source Take turns picking the book so both of you feel included. If you don’t want to go out and buy brand new books, hit up your local library instead.

steps.title: Buy the same game and start it at the same time.
steps.content: Buy the same game and start it at the same time. If it’s an online game, join a team together and play it side-by-side. Turn your chat feature on so you two can hang out and talk as you fight bad guys and earn points at the same time. [5] X Research source If video games aren’t your thing, try playing virtual board games or card games instead.

steps.title: Call your boyfriend and talk about what you’re both seeing.
steps.content: Call your boyfriend and talk about what you’re both seeing. [6] X Expert Source Moshe Ratson, MFT, PCC Marriage & Family Therapist Expert Interview. 7 August 2019. Since you’re both looking at the same sky, it’s a cute way to feel connected even though you’re apart. If you’re in completely different time zones, one of you can describe the stars while the other talks about clouds or the sun instead. [7] X Research source See if you can find any constellations!

steps.title: You can still be intimate, even with a long distance relationship.
steps.content: You can still be intimate, even with a long distance relationship. If you’ve never tried it before, send him a sexy text when you know he’s alone and not busy. You two can text back and forth, send saucy pictures, or even move to video chat to continue the conversation. [8] X Research source If texting or video chatting isn’t your thing, try having phone sex instead. You don’t have to see each other, and you can simply describe what you’d do if your boyfriend was in the room with you.

steps.title: Let him know a few days ahead of time that you’re coming.
steps.content: Let him know a few days ahead of time that you’re coming. That way, he can take some time off work or school so he isn’t too busy. Buy your tickets, pack your suitcase, and get going! The more often you two can see each other, the better. [9] X Research source If he’s planning to come and see you, surprise him by buying his tickets instead.
